transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes, good afternoon sir. Vinamra speaking Himanshu this side. Very good afternoon. How are you sir?
Customer: I'm good sir. How are you?
Executive: Yeah, from IndiaMART sir. Okay. Sir, we have the discussion with you right? My your record regarding the renewal. Right? And yeah, you told me that owner will be director will be available on 12th so that accordingly we can finalize the. But still still they are not they still they are not available in office. You just send me your quotations.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: What is the current quotation for you renewals?
Executive: Okay. Okay. I'll forward him and I'll take update from you their side. If I'm getting some details update I'll Yeah, all right.
Customer: Okay, I will I will so I can share you on the mail right sir? On the registered mail ID. Mail or WhatsApp both of the options are open for you.
Executive: Okay, okay, okay. I will share you because it's around 14 years sorry 15 years we have on the IndiaMART with the services right? Yeah. So it's time last time we did on the that the 30th of October 2022. So through the credit card only. So we can plan it.
Customer: Whatever whatever the service we are taking that last time send me the same same service quotation.
Executive: Same service yeah same TrustSeal TrustSeal three years. I will share you the same quotation. Okay. Okay. Okay. So this is your WhatsApp number?
Customer: Yes, it's same WhatsApp number.
Executive: So there is no plan to upgrade it to change the plan?
Customer: I'll discuss with sir if he allow me to I'll call you immediately.
Executive: Okay. So currently I can share you the two years that the same services plan and if sir will need you can connect me for the upgraded service right? Okay. Yes yes yes. Okay, so I will connect you on the WhatsApp.
Customer: Yes. Okay. I'll share you the details.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants quotation for renewal.

- Director not available in office.

- Wants the same service quotation as last time.



Resolution:

- Agreed to send the quotation on mail/WhatsApp.

- Executive confirmed it's been 15 years with IndiaMART.

- Executive agreed to share TrustSeal quotation.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss upgrade plan with director.

- Executive will connect on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, quotation, trustseal, whatsapp
